page.title: 10Canvey - Work & Leisure
page.content: There are two primary school in the area.{Winter Gardens County Primary {School}and{St.Katherines C.of E. {Primary School},both in Hilton Rd. St.Katherines was built exactly 10 years ago and Winter Gardens was built 8 years ago. A futuristically designed senior comprehensive school overlooking one of the best views in Essex is the{Castle View}in Meppel Ave.There is a{Baptist Church}in Hilton Rd and a{worship centre incorporated into the church school. {The Silver Jubilee}public house on the corner of Hilton Rd and Link Rd was built to commemorate the 1977 event although it was actually finished the year after. Waterside Farm Sports Centre has been open for 9 years and was named after the original farm . { }
